Module ulb.infof307.g10.app.controllers
Package ulb.infof307.g10.network.database

Class DatabaseManager

java.lang.Object
ulb.infof307.g10.network.database.DatabaseManager
Direct Known Subclasses:
DatabaseCardManager, DatabaseDeckManager, DatabaseStoreManager
public class DatabaseManager extends Object
DatabaseManager is used to create the database used by our application This class implements DatabaseDeckManager, DatabaseCardManager, DatabaseStoreManager
